document.full_text: b.j. upton hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning, giving the tampa bay rays a 3-2 victory over the toronto blue jays on tuesday night.
document.title: b.j. upton's walk-off homer beats blue jays
lines_and_colors: b.j. upton hit a two-run homer in the ninth inning, giving the tampa bay rays a 3-2 victory over the toronto blue jays on tuesday night.
